equally.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to the same degree or amount
equally.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: You must have a good education, but practical training is equally important.
equally.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: We agreed to divide the money equally between everyone.
equally.translation[0].definitions[2].de: used when introducing a second idea or statement that is as important as your first one
equally.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: We want the economy to grow, but equally we want low inflation.
